subject: Football
Funerals
Deaths (Fatalities)
lead_paragraph: Football players from Mainland Regional High School attended the funeral of a teammate, Edgar Bozzi, 16, in Goshen, N.J. He was one of four Mainland players killed in a crash on the Garden State Parkway on Saturday.
snippet: Football players from Mainland Regional High School attended the funeral of a teammate, Edgar Bozzi, 16, in Goshen, N.J. He was one of four Mainland players killed in a crash on the Garden State Parkway on Saturday.
